[](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/user/profile/5a7dc9d5e8ac2b3ac125e8d6?channel_type=web_note_detail_r10&xsec_token=ABY0YRsxM9lPzdm4cFxJX4tAT8rNu5iaVRAtXJIwQWzOE%3D&xsec_source=pc_note)[爱吃饭的11](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/user/profile/5a7dc9d5e8ac2b3ac125e8d6?channel_type=web_note_detail_r10&parent_page_channel_type=web_profile_board&xsec_token=ABY0YRsxM9lPzdm4cFxJX4tAT8rNu5iaVRAtXJIwQWzOE=&xsec_source=pc_note)
关注
钱还会回来的，但我再也不会在27岁…
在乌孙天堂湖看着蓝绿色湖面以及远处雪峰发呆 我无法言喻肉眼所见的震撼的美 不知道此生还会不会再来 我的眼睛必须一直睁着 我在这里狠狠滋养着自己的灵魂 我的生命就要浪费在这种地方 从此 我对人生的体验和美的追求已无法再往下兼容 [#徒步丈量世界](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E5%25BE%2592%25E6%25AD%25A5%25E4%25B8%2588%25E9%2587%258F%25E4%25B8%2596%25E7%2595%258C&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#徒步天花板](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E5%25BE%2592%25E6%25AD%25A5%25E5%25A4%25A9%25E8%258A%25B1%25E6%259D%25BF&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#乌孙古道](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E4%25B9%258C%25E5%25AD%2599%25E5%258F%25A4%25E9%2581%2593&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#天堂湖](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E5%25A4%25A9%25E5%25A0%2582%25E6%25B9%2596&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#徒步者的天堂](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E5%25BE%2592%25E6%25AD%25A5%25E8%2580%2585%25E7%259A%2584%25E5%25A4%25A9%25E5%25A0%2582&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#阿克库勒湖](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E9%2598%25BF%25E5%2585%258B%25E5%25BA%2593%25E5%258B%2592%25E6%25B9%2596&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#新疆旅游](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E6%2596%25B0%25E7%2596%2586%25E6%2597%2585%25E6%25B8%25B8&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)[#永远不缺重新出发的勇气](https://www.xiaohongshu.com/search_result?keyword=%25E6%25B0%25B8%25E8%25BF%259C%25E4%25B8%258D%25E7%25BC%25BA%25E9%2587%258D%25E6%2596%25B0%25E5%2587%25BA%25E5%258F%2591%25E7%259A%2584%25E5%258B%2587%25E6%25B0%2594&type=54&source=web_note_detail_r10)
编辑于 05-13 广东
